https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kPNy7Qyng5fAg262QbnTqV6bH6C.jpg A national feud and the philosophy of martial arts cause a conflict between two big families, one from China and one from Japan, which forced a mixed couple to separate. Their love stirred up bloody fighting between the Chinese and Japanese in the ancient martial world. Rong Hoi Shan, a kung fu genius, settled the disputes with his high martial arts skills. Lignite your sensations with a series of true kung fu fighting scenes, and itâ€™s the essence of Chinese martial arts. Dragon Get Angry
